definition: a computer for controlling antiaircraft fire that computes the position of an aircraft at the instant of a shell's arrival
details:
noun
- a computer for controlling antiaircraft fire that computes the position of an aircraft at the instant of a shell's arrival
- information that supports a probabilistic estimate of future events
= example: information that supports a probabilistic estimate of future events
- someone who makes predictions of the future (usually on the basis of special knowledge)
= synonyms: forecaster, prognosticator, soothsayer
